attributes.action: Play on Pac-Man until he gets 100k and make 25th April Pac-Man Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Pac-Man craze should be spread around Britain - we need to let people know just how good it is and the best way to do this is to make the PM play it.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
